title: All Ball - Pt. 2 Former Knicks and Grizzlies HC David Fizdale on Big 3 Heat Years, Memphis Break, Firing, Marc Gasol Clashes
itunes:title: All Ball - Pt. 2 Former Knicks and Grizzlies HC David Fizdale on Big 3 Heat Years, Memphis Break, Firing, Marc Gasol Clashes
description:
In this episode, Doug touches on l Anthony Davis' return, pushes back on Steph Curry hate , and is joined by former Knicks and Grizzlies Head Coach David Fizdale joins the pod - for the second installment of a two part interview . He recounts his climb up the NBA assistant coaching ranks working with Mike Woodson in Atlanta, and rejoining Spoelstra in Miami with the Heat, LeBron's Decision, what happened inside the devastating 2012 Mavs Finals loss, the Game 6 Ray Allen miracle in 2013, and his relationship with LeBron. He also looks back at his head coaching break with the Grizzlies, his clashes with Marc Gasol, what he would do differently, and what he sees in his future.
